name: Nobody Suspects Me
description:
Walk through a day as Dorian and help him try to be the best artist that he can be. This game is meant to be an experience of what it is like with imposter syndrome. I am in no way an expert, but myself and others have expressed feelings such as this. 

Created for the A Game By Its Cover Jam 2018.

Inspired by Adam Tierney's Famicase entry, Nobody Suspects Me.

http://famicase.com/18/softs/085.html

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Controls:

Use the Q E Z C buttons on your keyboard to help draw the art piece that Dorian needs to finish.
